scn MMChadForceReturnSCRIPT
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadOutside == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed != 0 && MMChadREF.GetDead == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadOutside to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravan188Paid to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanNovacPaid to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanSloanPaid to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanMOPaid to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanGrizzlyPaid to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanSTRunning to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadBrahmins to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadMerchant to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE01 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE02 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE03 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE04 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE05 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE06 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE07 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE08 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE09 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE10 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE11 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE12 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bRE13 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bEFiends01 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadWaiting to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReached188 to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedMO to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedGrizzly to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanBackToGrizzly to 0 GC01Guard01.moveto GC01Guard01Pos GC01Guard02.moveto GC01Guard02Pos GC01Merchant.moveto GC01MerchantPos GC01Brahmin01.moveto GC01Brahmin01Pos GC01Brahmin02.moveto GC01Brahmin02Pos GC01Guard01.disable GC01Guard02.disable GC01Merchant.disable GC01Brahmin01.disable GC01Brahmin02.disable MMFireAnt01.disable MMFireAnt02.disable MMFireAnt03.disable MMFireAnt04.disable MMChadREF.resetai MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPos endif
; This script makes sure that Chad won't stay forever on the Mojave Outpost if player is not willing to go with his caravan from there if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadOutside == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 0 && GetDayOfWeek != 3 && GetDayOfWeek != 6 && MMChadREF.GetInCell MMGrizzlyCaravansOffice == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadWaiting to 0 GC01Guard01.moveto GC01Guard01Pos GC01Guard02.moveto GC01Guard02Pos GC01Merchant.moveto GC01MerchantPos GC01Brahmin01.moveto GC01Brahmin01Pos GC01Brahmin02.moveto GC01Brahmin02Pos GC01Guard01.disable GC01Guard02.disable GC01Merchant.disable GC01Brahmin01.disable GC01Brahmin02.disable MMChadREF.resetai MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPos endif
; This script moves Chad and caravan to the Mojave Outpost when current day is Wednesday (3) or Saturday (6) if GetDayOfWeek == 3 || GetDayOfWeek == 6 if MMChadREF.GetDead == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bGuardApproved == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadWaiting to 0 MMChadREF.resetai MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPosMO GC01Merchant.enable GC01Guard01.enable GC01Brahmin01.enable GC01Brahmin02.enable if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bAdditionalGuard == 1 GC01Guard02.enable endif if GC01Merchant.GetDead != 0 GC01Merchant.resurrect endif if GC01Guard01.GetDead != 0 GC01Guard01.resurrect endif if GC01Brahmin01.GetDead != 0 GC01Brahmin01.resurrect endif if GC01Brahmin02.GetDead != 0 GC01Brahmin02.resurrect endif if GC01Guard02.GetDead != 0 GC01Guard02.resurrect endif GC01Guard01.moveto GC01Guard01PosMO GC01Guard02.moveto GC01Guard02PosMO GC01Merchant.moveto GC01MerchantPosMO GC01Brahmin01.moveto GC01Brahmin01PosMO GC01Brahmin02.moveto GC01Brahmin02PosMO endif endif
if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadWaiting == 1 && MMChadREF.GetDead == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadWaiting to 0 MMChadREF.resetai MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPos endif
END

scn MMGrizzlyCaravansBrahminSCRIPT
BEGIN OnDeath if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanSTRunning == 0 if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadBrahmins == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadBrahmins to 1 else set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadBrahmins to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadBrahmins + 1 endif else set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 ShowMessage MMCaravanDestroyedSTMsg Removeallitems endif END
BEGIN OnCombatEnd if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanSTRunning == 1 resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison endif END

scn MMCaravanGuardsQuestVARIABLES
short bShitShoveled short bBrahminDung
short bAdditionalGuard short bGuardApproved short bChadEssential short bChadOutside short bChadMojaveOutpost short bChadWaiting
short bFailed short bDeadBrahmins short bDeadMerchant
short bCaravanCount short bCaravanFinishedCount short bCaravanFollowChad short bCaravan2ndRouteAllowed
short bCaravanGrizzlyTo188 short bCaravanGrizzlyToSloan short bCaravan188ToNovac short bCaravanSloanToMO short bCaravanNovacToMO short bCaravanBackToGrizzly
short bCaravanReachedGrizzly short bCaravanReached188 short bCaravanReachedNovac short bCaravanReachedMO short bCaravanReachedSloan
short bCaravan188Paid short bCaravanNovacPaid short bCaravanMOPaid short bCaravanGrizzlyPaid short bCaravanSloanPaid
short bRE01 short bRE02 short bRE03 short bRE04 short bRE05 short bRE06 short bRE07 short bRE08 short bRE09 short bRE10 short bRE11 short bRE12 short bRE13 short bRE14 short bRE15
short bSETwins short bSERatKing short bSEBWB short bSETHE short bSEVanGraffs short bSEIronBros short bSENymeria
short bEFiends01
short bBWBConfronted
short bSpecialEncountersOff short bSpawnCazadoresOff short bSpawnFireGeckosOff short bSpawnLegionOff short bSpawnRaidersOff short bSpawnPowderGangerOff short bSpawnFeralsOff short bSpawnGiantAntsOff short bSpawnFireAntsOff short bSpawnNightstalkersOff
int bDistance
short bCaravanSpecialTransport short bCaravanSTStart short bCaravanSTRunning
short bUsingCaravanInformator
BEGIN Menumode
if bUsingCaravanInformator == 1
set bUsingCaravanInformator to 0
if (GetDayOfWeek == 1) ShowMessage MMInfoMonday 1 endif if (GetDayOfWeek == 2) ShowMessage MMInfoTuesday 1 endif
if (GetDayOfWeek == 3) ShowMessage MMInfoWednesday 1 endif
if (GetDayOfWeek == 4) ShowMessage MMInfoThursday 1 endif
if (GetDayOfWeek == 5) ShowMessage MMInfoFriday 1 endif
if (GetDayOfWeek == 6) ShowMessage MMInfoSaturday 1 endif
if (GetDayOfWeek == 0) ShowMessage MMInfoSunday 1 endif
endif
END

scn MMBrahminGooSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate Player if player.GetItemCount WeapShovel >= 1 && player.getequipped WeapShovel == 1 if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to 1 disable else set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung +1 disable endif endif END
BEGIN OnHitWith WeapShovel if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to 1 disable else set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung +1 disable endif END

BEGIN OnTriggerEnter MMChadREF

scn MMCaravanMOtoGrizzlyCaravansTriggerSCRIPT
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player ; This script moves Chad and caravan to the Mojave Outpost when current day is Wednesday (3) or Saturday (6) if GetDayOfWeek == 3 || GetDayOfWeek == 6 if MMChadREF.GetDead == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bGuardApproved == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost to 1 MMChadREF.resetai MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPosMO GC01Merchant.enable GC01Guard01.enable GC01Brahmin01.enable GC01Brahmin02.enable if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bAdditionalGuard == 1 GC01Guard02.enable endif if GC01Merchant.GetDead != 0 GC01Merchant.resurrect endif if GC01Guard01.GetDead != 0 GC01Guard01.resurrect endif if GC01Brahmin01.GetDead != 0 GC01Brahmin01.resurrect endif if GC01Brahmin02.GetDead != 0 GC01Guard02.resurrect endif if GC01Guard02.GetDead != 0 GC01Guard02.resurrect endif GC01Guard01.moveto GC01Guard01PosMO GC01Guard02.moveto GC01Guard02PosMO GC01Merchant.moveto GC01MerchantPosMO GC01Brahmin01.moveto GC01Brahmin01PosMO GC01Brahmin02.moveto GC01Brahmin02PosMO endif endif
; This script makes sure that Chad won't stay forever on the Mojave Outpost if player is not willing to go with his caravan from there if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadOutside == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 0 && GetDayOfWeek != 3 && GetDayOfWeek != 6 && MMChadREF.GetInCell MMGrizzlyCaravansOffice == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost to 0 GC01Guard01.moveto GC01Guard01Pos GC01Guard02.moveto GC01Guard02Pos GC01Merchant.moveto GC01MerchantPos GC01Brahmin01.moveto GC01Brahmin01Pos GC01Brahmin02.moveto GC01Brahmin02Pos GC01Guard01.disable GC01Guard02.disable GC01Merchant.disable GC01Brahmin01.disable GC01Brahmin02.disable MMChadREF.resetai MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPos endif
END

END

scn MMChadSCRIPT
BEGIN OnActivate Player ; To avoid some problematic situations if IsInCombat != 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed == 0 SetAlert 0 StopCombatAlarmOnActor StopCombat else Activate endif END
BEGIN OnHit Player ; This script makes sure that player can always kill Chad, even if he is "essential" if GetAv Health <= 0 && GetDead == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadEssential to 0 SetEssential MMGrizzlyCaravansChad 0 kill endif
if GetKnockedState == 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadEssential to 0 SetEssential MMGrizzlyCaravansChad 0 kill endif END
BEGIN OnCombatEND ;This script heal him after combat and cures poison resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 Dispel BarkScorpionPoison Dispel CazadorPoison Dispel DLC03RadScorpion3Poison Dispel NightstalkerPoison Dispel RadScorpion1Poison Dispel RadScorpion2Poison END
BEGIN OnDeath set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1
if player.GetInFaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction != 0 player.removefromfaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction endif
if GetEquipped MM10mmSMGChad == 1 unequipitem MM10mmSMGChad endif
if IsKiller Player == 0 ShowMessage MMChadDeadMsg else setenemy MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction MMGrizzlyCaravansFaction setenemy MMGrizzlyCaravansFaction PlayerFaction endif END
BEGIN Gamemode
;Script to set default distance between player and the caravan if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance to 2400 endif
; Script to control Chad's essential flag if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadEssential == 1 if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 1 if IsEssential == 0 SetEssential MMGrizzlyCaravansChad 1 endif endif elseif MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadEssential == 0 && MMChadREF.IsEssential != 0 SetEssential MMGrizzlyCaravansChad 0 endif
; Script to make sure that player is following the caravan, fails if not if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReached188 == 0 if MMChadREF.GetDistance Player > MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed == 0 && MMChadREF.GetDead == 0 if GC01Merchant.GetDead == 0 if GC01Merchant.GetDistance Player > MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance if GC01Guard01.GetDead == 0 if GC01Guard01.GetDistance Player > MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance ShowMessage MMCaravanFailMsg set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 endif else ShowMessage MMCaravanFailMsg set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 if player.GetInFaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction == 1 player.removefromfaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction endif endif endif else if GC01Guard01.GetDead == 0 if GC01Guard01.GetDistance Player > MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance ShowMessage MMCaravanFailMsg set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 if player.GetInFaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction == 1 player.removefromfaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction endif endif else ShowMessage MMCaravanFailMsg set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 if player.GetInFaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction == 1 player.removefromfaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction endif endif endif endif endif
; This script warns player if he/she is too far from the caravan if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReached188 == 0 if MMChadREF.GetDistance Player > (MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance -500) && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed == 0 && MMChadREF.GetDead == 0 if GC01Merchant.GetDead == 0 if GC01Merchant.GetDistance Player > (MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance -500) if GC01Guard01.GetDead == 0 if GC01Guard01.GetDistance Player > (MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance -500) ShowMessage MMCaravanWarnMsg endif else ShowMessage MMCaravanWarnMsg endif endif else if GC01Guard01.GetDead == 0 if GC01Guard01.GetDistance Player > (MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDistance -500) ShowMessage MMCaravanWarnMsg endif else ShowMessage MMCaravanWarnMsg endif endif endif endif
; Script that fails the caravan guard job if caravan merchant and all brahmins are dead if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadMerchant == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadBrahmins > 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad == 1 ShowMessage MMCaravanDestroyedMsg set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 endif
END

scn MMGrizzlyCaravansMerchantSCRIPT
BEGIN OnDeath set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bDeadMerchant to 1 END

scn MMCleanupSCRIPT
BEGIN OnLoad if GetDead != 0 disable markfordelete endif END

scn MMCaravanReachedNovacSCRIPT
float fTimer short RunTimer
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter MMChadREF
if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravan188ToNovac == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanBackToGrizzly == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravan188ToNovac to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac to 1 MMChadREF.resetai if GC01Guard01.GetDead == 0 GC01Guard01.resethealth endif if GC01Guard02.GetDead == 0 GC01Guard02.resethealth endif if GC01Merchant.GetDead == 0 GC01Merchant.resethealth endif if GC01Brahmin01.GetDead == 0 GC01Brahmin01.resethealth endif if GC01Brahmin02.GetDead == 0 GC01Brahmin02.resethealth endif MMChadREF.say GREETING set RunTimer to 1 endif
if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanNovacToMO == 1 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac == 0 && MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanBackToGrizzly == 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanNovacToMO to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanReachedNovac to 1 MMChadREF.resetai if GC01Guard01.GetDead == 0 GC01Guard01.resethealth endif if GC01Guard02.GetDead == 0 GC01Guard02.resethealth endif if GC01Merchant.GetDead == 0 GC01Merchant.resethealth endif if GC01Brahmin01.GetDead == 0 GC01Brahmin01.resethealth endif if GC01Brahmin02.GetDead == 0 GC01Brahmin02.resethealth endif MMChadREF.say GREETING set RunTimer to 1 endif
END
BEGIN Gamemode if RunTimer == 1 if fTimer < 120 set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed else MMChadREF.say MMChadCaravanGO set RunTimer to 0 set fTimer to 0 endif endif END

END

ESP.ORIGINAL:
They have changed. A lot. Since death of our commander or specifically - after Lady taking his place they are no longer... we are no longer the same people.
We were doing this for a reason. We were sent to seek for justice. We were protecting smallfolk from those dirty thugs in colourful costumes. Not just from those in crimson, but from anyone who harmed civilians. But now... now we are no longer the same. The Fellowship's changed. We now do what we tried to eradicate. I no longer want to be a part of it.
They've agreed. Me and few more men are leaving the Brotherhood. One more mission and I'm free to go wherever I want. I will no longer be in your fight brothers. But... let the god be with you. The night is dark and full of terrors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们已经改变了。很多。自从我们的指挥官去世后，或者特别是在女士接替他的位置后，他们就不再是……我们不再是同一个人了。 -_- 我们这样做是有原因的。我们被派去寻求正义。我们正在保护老百姓免受那些穿着五颜六色服装的肮脏暴徒的侵害。不仅来自那些深红色的人，还来自任何伤害平民的人。但现在……现在我们不再一样了。团契变了我们现在正在做我们试图根除的事情。我不想再成为其中的一部分。 -_- 他们同意了。我和其他几个人将离开兄弟会。再执行一项任务，我就可以自由地去任何我想去的地方了。我不会再和你们兄弟们战斗了。 但是...让神与你同在。夜色漆黑，充满了恐怖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome friends. We are here to protect you. But protection's hungry work. So you will hand us your food, firearms and brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎朋友。我们在这里保护你。但保护工作是一项艰巨的工作。所以你要把你的食物、枪支和婆罗门交给我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GREETING_00017CB4_1.wav
NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Incredibly helpful insect for testing this mod: Mister DeBug, at your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于测试这个模组非常有帮助的昆虫：调试先生，随时为您服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GREETING_0000E9FF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey. Chad told me about you. You're doing a lot of good work as a guard. Here's a little bonus for your service. Use it well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。查德告诉我关于你的事。作为一名警卫，你做了很多出色的工作。这是对您服务的一点奖励。好好利用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GREETING_0000CA65_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Grizzly Caravans office. What brings you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到灰熊商队办公室。什么风把你吹到这儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GREETING_0000143E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again. What brings you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再一次问好。什么风把你吹到这儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GREETING_00001441_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello, I'm Chad. I handle all the recruitment. How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，我是查德。我负责所有的招聘工作。我能为你做些什么？

All right. The path through Quarry Junction is clear from deathclaws. Still dangerous. What do you think? Shall we go through Novac or Sloan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。通过采石场枢纽的道路没有死亡爪。但是还是危险。你怎么想？我们要通过诺瓦克还是斯隆？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GREETING_00014BBC_1.wav
NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GOODBYE_0000145B_1.wav
NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_GOODBYE_0001C1B3_1.wav
NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Report to Chad, he handles hiring caravan guards and caravaners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。向查得报告，他负责雇用商队警卫和商队司机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlyJo_00001440_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Get to work. Report to me when you're finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。开始工作吧。完成后向我报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlyJo_0000B92A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to be a shit shoveler for Chad. I'm looking for a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经是查得的铲屎官。我在找工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're in need of new caravan guards, so we'll need some of the most hardened veterans we could get our hands on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要新的商队守卫，所以我们需要一些我们能找到的最坚强的老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJob_00001445_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you're a pacifist little bitch, then we have a job opening for brahmin-shit shoveling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你是一个和平主义者，那么我们就有一个铲婆罗门屎的工作机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJob_00001445_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's great. All right people, our break time's over. Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太棒了。好了大家，我们的休息时间结束了。我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJob_0000A7BA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadOutside to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost to 0 player.addtofaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanNovacToMO to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanBackToGrizzly to 1 MMChadREF.resetai GC01Merchant.resetai GC01Guard01.resetai GC01Brahmin01.resetai GC01Brahmin02.resetai GC01Guard02.resetai

if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to 1 elseif MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount >= 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount + 1 endif endif
Sure. I can guard you caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我可以守护你的商队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to guard a caravan.
Great. We've got a special transport from the Mojave Outpost. Wanna help us get started on that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。我们有一辆从莫哈韦前哨站出发的特殊交通工具。想帮助我们开始做这件事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_00010F4D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Before I'll tell you the details I must know if you're the right person for this job. What are your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。在告诉您详细信息之前，我必须知道您是否是这份工作的合适人选。你有什么技能？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_00001447_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to become a Caravan Guard
Are you sure? But you're so good at shoveling brahmin shit! HAH! Nah I'm just kidding... Alright. let's see your qualifications.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定吗？但你铲婆罗门屎的功夫真好！哈！不，我只是开玩笑……好吧。让我们看看你的资格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_00001CF9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your skills? Besides being an excellent shit shoveler of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么技能？当然，除了成为一名优秀的铲屎官之外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_00001CF9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to become a Caravan Guard.
All right. We're about to go to the Mojave Outpost through 188, Novac, and Nipton. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我们即将经过 188、诺瓦克和尼普顿前往莫哈韦前哨站。任何问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_000025CA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. We're about to go to the Mojave Outpost. Are you ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我们即将前往莫哈韦前哨基地。你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_00014BBA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good but we run caravans from here only on Mondays and Thursdays. Come back later, we'll talk more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很好，但我们只在周一和周四从这里运营商队。稍后回来，我们再聊更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobCarava_000048A4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing's bad in shit shoveling. I can do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 铲屎官没什么不好的。我可以做这个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Take a shovel and get to work, you little bitch, HAH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。拿起铲子去干活吧，你这个小贱人，哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobShitSh_00001449_1.wav

All right. Take a shovel and get to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。拿起铲子开始工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadJobShitSh_0000145A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can shovel some brahmin crap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以铲一些婆罗门垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job. Here are your 50 caps, you little bitch! HAH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。这是你的 50 瓶盖，你这个小贱人！哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadShitShove_00001455_1.wav

Good job. Here are your 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。这是你的 50 瓶盖
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadShitShove_00001456_1.wav

Good job! You're getting really good at this! Here are your caps with some bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮！你真的很擅长这个！这是您的瓶盖和一些奖金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadShitShove_00001457_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and I recommend spending it at Gomorrahs. You need the perfume from the prostitutes there, Stinky Pete!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我建议在蛾摩拉消费。你需要那里妓女的香水，臭皮特！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadShitShove_00001457_2.wav

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A sharpshooter, eh? You'll do just fine. You're hired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 神枪手？你会做得很好。你被录取了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillGuns_000022D9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. Come back when you'll improve your skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。等你的技能提高了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillGuns_000022DA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't shoot for shit. I think you have better aim with that shovel digging into brahmin shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能为了狗屎而开枪。我认为你用铲子挖婆罗门的粪便有更好的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillGuns_000025C7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm expert of using energy weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是使用能量武器的专家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I could use your skills. You'll do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我可以利用你的技能。你会做得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillEner_000022DC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: That isn't enough I'm afraid. Come back when you'll improve your skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。等你的技能提高了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillEner_000022DD_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. But hey! You're always welcome in the brahmin pen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。但是嘿！婆罗门围栏随时欢迎您。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillEner_000025C9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm an explosives expert. Nothing's better than a grenade launcher, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一名炸药专家。没有什么比榴弹发射器更好了，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, just don't accidentally blow up the caravan, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，只是别不小心炸毁了商队，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillExpl_000022DF_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. Come back when you'll improve your skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。等你的技能提高了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillExpl_000022E0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not good enough pal. Maybe you'll have better experience blowing up brahmin shit with that shovel. Get back to work!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不够好朋友。也许你会有更好的体验用铲子炸毁婆罗门屎。回去工作！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillExpl_000025C8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love blades, knifes and sledgehammers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢刀片、小刀和大锤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr. Stabby or Mr. Crushy eh? Alright I think you'll intimidate them raiders. You're hired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯塔比先生还是克鲁希先生，是吗？好吧，我想你会吓唬他们的袭击者。你被录取了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillMele_000022E2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen the way you swing that shovel at brahmin shit. You hit that brahmin shit so hard its like your life depends on it. You're hired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过你挥舞铲子铲婆罗门屎的样子。你对那个婆罗门狗屎的打击如此之大，就像你的生命依赖于它一样。你被录取了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillMele_000022E7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. Come back when you'll improve your skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。等你的技能提高了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillMele_000022E3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. I think shoveling that shit in the brahmin pen will make you stronger though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。我认为把那些东西铲进婆罗门围栏会让你变得更强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillMele_000022E8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love punching people. Nothing's better than a power fist, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢打人。没有什么比强力拳头更好的了，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. Come back when you'll improve your skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。等你的技能提高了再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillUnar_000022E5_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got strong hands, like my pa did. He was good at pummeling people with his fists. You'll do just fine my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一双有力的手，就像我爸爸一样。他擅长用拳头打人。你会做得很好我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillUnar_000022E6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't enough I'm afraid. But hey! You're always welcome to punching brahmin shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这还不够。但是嘿！随时欢迎你来打婆罗门屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSkillUnar_000025C6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much are you paying for this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为这份工作付多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: 300 caps in 188, 400 in Novac and 500 when we'll reach Mojave Outpost. That gives you 1200 caps for a whole route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 188给你300瓶盖，诺瓦克给你400，到达莫哈韦前哨站后给你500。这为您提供了整条路线 一共1200瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGu_000025CC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1200 caps for a whole route. If we'll choose the path through 188 you'll get your 300 there, 400 in Novac, and 500 when we get to the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全路线1200个瓶盖。如果我们选择通过 188 的路径，您将在那里获得 300 瓶盖，在诺瓦克获得 400 瓶盖，当我们到达莫哈韦前哨站时获得 500 瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGu_0001574D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if we'll go through Sloan you'll get there your payment of 700 caps and the rest in the Mojave Outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们通过斯隆，您将在那里支付 700 瓶瓶盖，其余的则在莫哈韦前哨站支付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGu_000025CE_1.wav

Oh, alright then. No worries. I hate to see you go. Well, we're here if you want to make caps again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那好吧。不用担心。我讨厌看到你走。好吧，如果您想再次赚点瓶盖，我们就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGu_000025D0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I gotta resign. I got other places to be right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我得辞职了。我现在还有其他地方要去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our caravan is going to the Mojave Outpost, through 188 Trading Post, Novac and Nipton. Any questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的商队将途径 188 贸易站、诺瓦克和尼普顿前往莫哈韦前哨站。任何问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadContinueL_000025D2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately there's no caravan today. We run caravans on Mondays and Thursdays, and from the Mojave Outpost, Wednesdays and Saturdays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是今天没有商队。我们每周一和周四运营大篷车，周三和周六从莫哈韦前哨出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadContinueL_000048A5_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该离开这个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right people, break time is over. Let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了各位，休息时间结束了。我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGO_00003178_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 好了各位，休息时间结束了。我们走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGO_0000A7BD_1.wav

What the fuck? You want to leave, right now? Alright well if that's your choice, I can't force you. Mr. Grizzly won't be happy about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么鬼？你现在就想离开吗？好吧，既然你选择了，我也不能强迫你。灰熊先生对此不会高兴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanLe_0000317A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well what the fuck man? We're on duty right now! What the fuck? Okay if thats your choice, see ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么他妈的怎么了？我们现在就值班啦！搞什么鬼？好吧，如果这是你的选择，再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanLe_0000657A_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bFailed to 1 if player.GetInFaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction == 1 player.removefromfaction MMCaravanGuardPlayerFaction endif
Sorry, I got other things to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我还有其他事情要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stick with you I guess.
Come on man, you gotta take this seriously. Who decides to leave during a job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，伙计，你必须认真对待这件事。谁在工作期间决定离职？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanLe_0000657C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really felt like you were gonna leave me here. We're undermanned as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的感觉你要把我留在这里。我们现在人手不足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanLe_0000657C_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just kidding. I'll stick around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在开玩笑。我会留下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't we go a little faster?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就不能走快一点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the hurry? You gotta take a shit or something? I'll tell the caravan to move their asses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 急什么？你得拉屎还是做别的什么的吗？我会叫商队的人移动他们的屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSpeedUP_00008246_1.wav

Can't we slow down a little?
Okay, we'll take it easy for a bit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSpeedDOWN_00008248_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: MMChadREF.modav speedmult -10 GC01Merchant.modav speedmult -10 GC01Guard01.modav speedmult -10 GC01Brahmin01.modav speedmult -10 GC01Brahmin02.modav speedmult -10 GC01Guard02.modav speedmult -10
What can you tell me about Chad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于查德，你能告诉我什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a good caravaner. Maybe it's in his blood. I've heard that his father was a caravan master in a town up north called, Broken Hills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是一个很好的商队司机。也许这是在他的血液里。我听说他的父亲是北方一个名叫布罗肯希尔斯的小镇的商队老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlyCh_0000B929_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job. Here are your 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。这是你的 50 瓶盖
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlySh_0000B92C_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bShitShoveled to 1 player.additem Caps001 50
Good job. Here are your 50 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。这是你的 50 瓶盖
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlySh_0000B92D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bShitShoveled to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bShitShoveled +1 player.additem Caps001 50
Good job. Do you really like this line of work son? If that's the case, here's a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。孩子，你真的喜欢这份工作吗？如果是这样的话，这是一个奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlySh_0000B92E_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bBrahminDung to 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bShitShoveled to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bShitShoveled +1 player.additem Caps001 75 player.additem OutfitRepublican01 1 player.additem CowboyHat02 1 MMFreeBed.setownership MMFreeLocker.setownership player.addperk MMExpertExcrementExpeditorPerk ShowMessage MMExcrementExpeditorPerkMsg
How much are you paying for this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为这份工作付多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: 500 caps in Novac, 400 in 188 and 300, when we'll reach our outpost near Vegas. That gives you 1200 caps for a whole route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在诺瓦克给你500瓶盖，在 188给你400，当我们到达维加斯附近的前哨基地时，再给你300。这为您提供了整条路线一共120个瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadMOHowMuch_0000BC0D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. What exactly do you want? Ammo, meds, food, lamp oil, rope, bombs? Its yours my friend, as long as you have enough rubys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。你到底想要什么？弹药、药品、食物、灯油、绳索、炸弹？朋友，只要你有足够的红宝石，它就是你的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSupplies_0000DE73_1.wav

NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE75_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: 9mm? Your standard bread and butter round for all pistols. Lethal at 50 meters. Competes with the .45 with the right primer and powder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 9毫米？适用于所有手枪的标准面包和黄油弹。 50米处致命。使用正确的底火和火药可与 .45 竞争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE77_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ten millimeter. Good choice, strong and versatile. Recoil is quite the kick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 十毫米。不错的选择，坚固且用途广泛。后坐力相当强劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE79_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The .357 is a good choice, classic child of Smith and Wesson. Son of the .38. High velocity at 100 yards."
ESP.TRADUIT: .357 是一个不错的选择，是 Smith 和 Wesson 的经典之作。 .38 之子。 100 码处高速。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE7B_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The 12 gauge? Good for hunting moving targets like geckos and ghouls. You got your primer, powder, shot wad and buckshot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 12号的？适合狩猎移动目标，如壁虎和食尸鬼。你已经拿到了底火、火药、弹丸和铅弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE7D_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The most popular gauge, easier to handle than the 12 gauge. Load with either a slug or buck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最流行的量规，比 12 量规更容易操作。使用弹头或降压负载。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE7F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh, a the 5.56 NATO. Belgium Home-made. If yawed on soft tissue, fragments will spread through flesh and bone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，5.56 NATO。比利时自制。如果在软组织上偏转，碎片会扩散到肌肉和骨骼中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE81_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh some energy cells? Okay here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，一些能量细胞？好的，就到这里吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesA_0000DE83_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never enough stimpaks, huh? I get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医疗针永远不够，是吧？给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesM_0000DE85_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take some food and water.
Okay. We have plenty of food and water. Just don't eat it all, alright? We gotta have enough for the trip back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我们有充足的食物和水。只是别全部吃掉，好吗？我们得带够回程的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadSuppliesF_0000DE87_1.wav

ESP.TRADUIT: 运行 Mod 配置终端

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Force spawn Keeng Ra'at II (between Novac and MO, close to Wolfhorn ranch)
ESP.TRADUIT: 强制生成 Keeng Ra'at II（Novac 和 MO 之间，靠近 Wolfhorn 牧场）

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MME05S01.placeatme MMToughMoleRatKing MME05S02.placeatme MMToughMoleRat2 2 MME05S03.placeatme MMToughMoleRat2 2 MME05S04.placeatme MMToughMoleRat2 2 MME05S05.placeatme MMToughMoleRat2 2 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bSERatKing to 1
Force Spawn Caravan Raiding Twins (near 188 Trading Post)
ESP.TRADUIT: 原力产卵商队袭击双胞胎（188 贸易站附近）

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MME09S01.placeatme MMSpecialSpawnTwins01 MME09S02.placeatme MMSpecialSpawnTwins02 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bSETwins to 1
Increase Caravan Count and Finished Caravan Count(+1)
ESP.TRADUIT: 增加商队数量和成品商队数量(+1)

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to 1 endif if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount >= 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount + 1 endif if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFinishedCount == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFinishedCount to 1 endif if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFinishedCount >= 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFinishedCount to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFinishedCount + 1 endif
Alright! That's great! Let's get started then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧！那太棒了！那么我们就开始吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGu_00010F4F_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanSpecialTransport to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadMojaveOutpost to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bChadWaiting to 0 MMChadREF.resetai GC01Merchant.enable GC01GuardWE01.enable GC01GuardWE02.enable GC01Brahmin01.enable GC01Brahmin02.enable GC01Merchant.resurrect GC01Brahmin01.resurrect GC01Brahmin02.resurrect GC01GuardWE01.resurrect GC01GuardWE02.resurrect GC01GuardWE01.moveto GC01Guard01PosMO GC01GuardWE02.moveto GC01Guard02PosMO GC01Merchant.moveto GC01MerchantPosMO GC01Brahmin01.moveto GC01Brahmin01PosMO GC01Brahmin02.moveto GC01Brahmin02PosMO

if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to 1 elseif MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount >= 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount + 1 endif endif MMChadREF.moveto MMChadPosMO player.moveto MMChadREF 128 1
Can I take my companion with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以带我的同伴一起去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. But don't expect to squeeze more caps out of me. We can't afford hiring more guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。但别指望从我身上榨取更多的瓶盖。我们雇不起更多的警卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanGu_000131B3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I have companions with me?
Deathclaws at Quarry Junction are no longer a threat. Maybe you'll consider opening a second route?
ESP.TRADUIT: 采石场交界处的死亡爪不再是威胁。也许您会考虑开辟第二条路线？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws weren't the only problem. Powder Gangers and Fiends are a real threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪并不是唯一的问题。炸药帮和恶魔是真正的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlySe_000148DC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you may be right. I won't risk sending caravans from the Mojave Outpost, but you can talk with Chad about caravans from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你可能是对的。我不会冒险从莫哈韦哨站派遣商队，但你可以从这里与查德讨论商队的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : John Grizzly [01000E2D] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMJohnGrizzlySe_000148DC_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws at Quarry Junction are no longer a threat. We could open a second route. Think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 采石场交界处的死亡爪不再是威胁。我们可以开辟第二条路线。想一想。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the others? My vote is Sloan. All right, if that's what you want. Let's take a longer path through Novac.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人呢？我投斯隆一票。好吧，如果这就是你想要的。让我们通过 Novac 走更长的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanRo_00014BBE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanGrizzlyTo188 to 1 MMChadREF.resetai GC01Merchant.resetai GC01Guard01.resetai GC01Brahmin01.resetai GC01Brahmin02.resetai GC01Guard02.resetai

if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to 1 elseif MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount >= 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount + 1 endif endif
That's what I wanted to hear. All right people, let's hit the road. It may be your last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我想听到的。好了，大家，我们上路吧。这可能是你的最后一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadCaravanRo_00014BC0_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanFollowChad to 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanGrizzlyToSloan to 1 MMChadREF.resetai GC01Merchant.resetai GC01Guard01.resetai GC01Brahmin01.resetai GC01Brahmin02.resetai GC01Guard02.resetai

if MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount == 0 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to 1 elseif MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount >= 1 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount to MMCaravanGuardQuest.bCaravanCount + 1 endif endif
We are not giving you anything. Stand out or you'll die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不会给你任何东西。站出来，否则你就会死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh really? You want to fight? Oh you'll get it. I hope you're ready to die, asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦真的吗？你想打架吗？哦，你会明白的。我希望你已经准备好去死了，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMLemPrompt_00017CB6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy MMBWBFaction MMGrizzlyCaravansFaction SetEnemy MMBWBFaction PlayerFaction StartCombat Player
You ain't taking shit. Fuck off, or die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么狗屎？滚蛋，或者死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step aside. We cannot give you what you need but there is no need for violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 退到一边去。我们不能给你你需要的东西，但没有必要使用暴力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. There is no other choice. Hand over your stuff or we'll fuck you up by force!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，没有其他选择。交出你的东西，否则我们就操你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMLemTalk_00017CB8_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no need for violence. Please let us end this amicably.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有必要使用暴力。请让我们友好地结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like you leave my no choice but to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你让我别无选择，只能杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think you're hot shit?! Time to DIE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你很辣么？！是时候去死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMLemKill_00017CBA_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy MMBWBFaction MMGrizzlyCaravansFaction SetEnemy MMBWBFaction PlayerFaction StartCombat Player
You leave me no choice. I'll have to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我别无选择。我必须杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right then. Put your weapons on the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。把你的武器放在地上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMLemSurrender_00017CBC_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You've lost your mind? We do not surrender. Shoot 'em!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你失去理智了吗？我们不会投降。射击他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chad [01000E38] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMChadBWBSurren_00017CBE_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy MMBWBFaction MMGrizzlyCaravansFaction SetEnemy MMBWBFaction PlayerFaction StartCombat MMBWBLemonREF
{Smirk}Don't make me repeat myself. Hand over your steel, your food, and your brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: {傻笑}别让我重复一遍。交出你的钢铁、你的食物和你的婆罗门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Lemon [010179CE] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\MM Caravan Guard.esp\MMVoiceMale01\MMCaravanG_MMLemProtection_00017CC1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Force Spawn BWB Deserters (between Novac and MO, close to Wolfhorn ranch)

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MMBWBLemonREF.enable MMBWBNotchREF.enable MMBWBTomREF.enable MMBWBAnguyREF.enable MMLemTriggerREF.enable set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bSEBWB to 1
Force Spawn Iron Brothers (near The Basincreek Building; Sloan route)

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MME10S01.placeatme MMIronBrothers01 MME10S02.placeatme MMIronBrothers02 set MMCaravanGuardQuest.bSEIronBros to 1

ESP.TRADUIT: 显示已完成的商队数量

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister DeBug [0100E9FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100143D]MMCaravanGuardQuest) Caravan Guard Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expert Excrement Expeditor: You can sling bull with the best of them. For you shoveling brahmin crap is more than just a hobby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 排泄物专家：你可以用其中最好的人来吊公牛。对你来说，铲婆罗门垃圾不仅仅是一种爱好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no longer a caravan guard!
Your caravan has been destroyed. You're no longer a caravan guard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的商队已被摧毁。你不再是商队守卫了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: For you shoveling brahmin crap is more than just a hobby. You've gained perk Expert Excrement Expeditor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你来说，铲婆罗门屎不仅仅是一种爱好。您已经获得了“专家排泄物加速器”特权。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're too far from your caravan!

Today is: MONDAY
There is a caravan from GRIZZLY CARAVANS to the Mojave Outpost
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天是： 星期一 -_- 有一支商队从 GRIZZLY CARAVANS 前往莫哈韦前哨站

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today is: TUESDAY
There are no caravans today. Next caravan will be tomorrow, from the Mojave Outpost to Grizzly Caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天是： 星期二 -_- 今天没有大篷车。下一个商队将于明天从莫哈维前哨站前往灰熊商队。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today is: WEDNESDAY
There is a caravan from the MOJAVE OUTPOST to Grizzly Caravans
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天是： 星期三 -_- 有一支商队从莫哈韦前哨前往灰熊商队

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today is: Thursday
There is a caravan from GRIZZLY CARAVANS to the Mojave Outpost
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天是：星期四 -_- 有一支商队从 GRIZZLY CARAVANS 前往莫哈韦前哨站

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today is: FRIDAY
There are no caravans today. Next caravan will be tomorrow, from the Mojave Outpost to Grizzly Caravans.
